result.error: llama_index is not installed. LLM features are unavailable.

issues: System dependency error: llama_index not installed

system_issues.description: The LLM component (llama_index) is not installed, preventing all query processing.
system_issues.impact: All RAG queries fail with 'llama_index is not installed' error
system_issues.recommendation: Install llama-index package: pip install llama-index or add to pyproject.toml dependencies

system_issues.description: When LLM is unavailable, the system should still be able to perform document retrieval without answer generation.
system_issues.impact: Users cannot even see relevant regulations when LLM is down
system_issues.recommendation: Implement search-only mode that returns raw documents without LLM-generated summaries

system_issues.description: Previous evaluation showed 'API Error: 429 Insufficient balance' for professor persona
system_issues.impact: Cannot run full RAG quality evaluation
system_issues.recommendation: Recharge API balance and set up budget alerts

recommendations: Fix dependency installation by updating pyproject.toml with llama-index requirement
Implement graceful degradation: search without LLM should return document excerpts
Set up health check endpoint to verify RAG system components
Create mock/test mode for development without API dependencies
Add integration tests to verify system can answer professor queries
